name: Shampoo
description:
Aloe & Oatmeal Shampoo:

Soothing Shampoo formulated with moisturizers for itchy and dry skin.  Aloe & Oatmeal Shampoo provides relief from itchy, scaling and sensitive skin. It also contains emollients to restore natural moisture to the skin and is a hypoallergenic formulation. 


Hyliderm Shampoo:

A soap free hypoallergenic shampoo for routine cleansing of normal, dry or sensitive skin that has a cucumber melon aroma.  Hyliderm Shampoo contains emollients for moisturizing factors to promote hydration of skin and coat and aid in the control of flaking and scaling. 


All proceeds go to Paws 4 You Rescue - a 501(c)3 non-profit, volunteer animal rescue organization based in Miami, Florida.

name: Conditioner
description:
Aloe & Oatmeal Conditioner contains a unique combination of natural soothing agents, moisturizers and vitamins.

Soothing skin and coat conditioner formulated with moisturizers, Vitamins A, D & E, and Chamomile.

All proceeds go to Paws 4 You Rescue - a 501(c)3 non-profit, volunteer animal rescue organization based in Miami, Florida.

name: Raspberry Burst Body Spray for Dogs
description:
Raspberry Burst Body Spray

Deodorizing pet cologne adds extra freshness after bathing or between baths.  

Deodorizes your pet and reduces static.

All proceeds go to Paws 4 You Rescue - a 501(c)3 non-profit, volunteer animal rescue organization based in Miami, Florida.

name: Antibacterial Hand Cleanser for Humans
description:
Antibacterial Hand Cleanser

This hand soap is a luxurious antibacterial hand cleanser formulated for frequent washing. 

It cleanses and hydrates the skin while preventing chapping. Its germicidal agent eliminates most common pathogens without damaging the skin's natural ecology. 

It leaves hands soft and has a pleasant fragrance.

Haute or Not approved for "hauteness"!

All proceeds go to Paws 4 You Rescue - a 501(c)3 non-profit, volunteer animal rescue organization based in Miami, Florida.
